mapper.select: SELECT a.ID ID,a.FEATURED,a.TITLE,DATE_FORMAT(a.DATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') DATE_TIME,a.AUTHOR,a.INTRODUCE,b.ID LINK_ID,b.TYPE,b.CONTENT LINK_CONTENT,b.HREF FROM (SELECT d.ID ID,d.FEATURED,d.TITLE,d.DATE_TIME,d.AUTHOR,d.INTRODUCE FROM post d ORDER BY DATE_TIME DESC LIMIT #{start, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{count, jdbcType=INTEGER}) a LEFT JOIN post_link e ON a.ID = e.POST_ID LEFT JOIN link b ON e.LINK_ID = b.ID AND b.TYPE = #{type, jdbcType=CHAR}
